===Tsviets===

[[Image:Tsviets.jpg|thumb|right|Left to right, Tsviets Azul, Rosso, Shelke, and Nero]]
 
The '''Tsviets''' are the highest ranking elite squad within Deepground and its chain of command. All of the members of the group are named after colors from different languages, hence the group's name, which is based on ''ÑÐ²ÐµÑ'', the [[Russian language|Russian]] word for ''color''.{{Fact|date=July 2007}} Five members appear in the single player mode of the game, and at least one more member appears in the online mode.
The '''Tsviets''' are the highest ranking elite squad within Deepground and its chain of command. All of the members of the group are named after colors from different languages, hence the group's name, which is based on ''ÑÐ²ÐµÑ'', the [[Russian language|Russian]] word for ''color''.{{Fact|date=July 2007}} Five members appear in the single player mode of the game, and at least one more member appears in the online mode.
